title: La Femme Nikita: Season 2
description: La Femme Nikita: The Complete Second Season

After a brief period of freedom, Nikita (Peta Wilson--Mercy) a secret government assassin for Section One, returns to save the very organization she formerly tried to escape and becomes intimately involved with her trainer and fellow operative, Michael (Roy Dupuis--Screamers).
